row.process:
:SET &UC4RB_DB_SCRIPT_SEPR# = ";" :SET &UC4RB_SQL_SEPARATOR# = "," :SET &UC4RB_SQL_PASSWORD# = "" :SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = "revoke "
:IF &UC4RB_DB_REVOKE_SYS_PRVLGS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " &UC4RB_DB_REVOKE_SYS_PRVLGS#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_REVOKE_ROLE_PRIVILEGE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " &UC4RB_DB_REVOKE_ROLE_PRIVILEGE#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_RVK_CUST_ROLE_PRVLG# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " &UC4RB_DB_RVK_CUST_ROLE_PRVLG#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_REVOKE_OBJ_PRIVILEGE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " &UC4RB_DB_REVOKE_OBJ_PRIVILEGE#") :ENDIF
:IF "YES" = &UC4RB_REVOKE_ALL_SYS_PRVLGS# OR &UC4RB_REVOKE_ALL_USR_PRVLGS# : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " all privileges") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_RVK_ON_SCHEMA_OBJECT# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " ON &UC4RB_DB_RVK_ON_SCHEMA_OBJECT#") :ENDIF :SET &UC4RB_SQL_DATABASENAME# = ""
:SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " FROM")
:IF &UC4RB_DB_REVOKE_FROM_USER# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " &UC4RB_DB_REVOKE_FROM_USER#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_REVOKE_FROM_ROLE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " &UC4RB_DB_REVOKE_FROM_ROLE#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_REVOKE_FROM_PUBLIC# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#, " public") :ENDIF : SET &UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SQL_CONTENT#,";")
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_DB.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_SQL_SCRIPT_FILE :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_DB.PRV.INCLUDE.EXECUTE_SQL_STATEMENT
